Title: Silverlight Panorama Viewer
Description: Panorama viewer using cubic projection pictures.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A Cubic Panorama viewer in Silverlight 2beta2
Click and drag the mouse to rotate the camera.
Press T to switch between Textured and polygon render mode.
Press + / - to zoom in and out.

Rotation and zoom can be controlled from c#

Online example : http://www.amercom.nl/showcase/silverlight/panoramacube2/PanoramaCubeTestPage.html

The texture mapping routine uses 1 single Matrix calculation for its texture mapping, no need for Matrix inversion and concatenation as seen in other texture mapping solutions.

Main Panoviewer code and Texture mapping routines by Martijn Croezen http://whizzkid74.blogspot.com
Cleanup and conversion to Webcontrol by Rob Houweling http://web-snippets.blogspot.com
